longMSG:
You are in a BAR LOUNGE on the 1st floor. It looks like there was a party.
There is a BAR COUNTER, STOOLS, a CABINET, and a POOL TABLE.
You may go WEST to the LIVING ROOM.
shortMSG:
You are in a BAR LOUNGE on the 1st floor.
Features: BAR COUNTER, STOOLS, CABINET, POOL TABLE
Areas you may go to: WEST/LIVING ROOM
